text: (raaja) ne un striyon se poochhaah tumhaara kya anubhav hai, us samay ka, jab tumane yoosuf ke man ko rijhaaya tha? sabane kahaah allaah pavitr hai! usapar hamane koee buraee ka prabhaav nahin jaana. tab azeez kee patnee bol utheeh ab saty ujaagar ho gaya, vaastav mein, mainne hee usake man ko rijhaaya tha aur nihsandeh vah satyavaadiyon mein hai
